topics.body:
Finished secret of kells 
This movie is friggin beautiful
The story on the whole is pretty cliche though. The old 
"parental figure I desire to be an artist of some description" 
"no child figure you shall have a practical job" 
"but no"
 "okay"

But _look_
!https://thespectatorial.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/secret-of-kells-4.jpg!
THE WHOLE MOVIE LOOKS LIKE THIS
This is very clearly the work of artists. I don't just mean people who can draw, plan and animate, I mean people who can pour their souls into those things. People who are told to draw a giant tree and instead of just some plain redwood they draw what you see above.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
